name: Archeologist simulator 2021
description:
You must found more artifact than your enemy.

Destroy or steal enemy's artifacts is possible.

Player one keys :
Move : Arrow up, down, left, right 
Dig artifact : spam "space"
Destroy artifact ( must be already dug) : "space"
Take artifact and drop into the truck : "B"
Dash : "N"

Player two keys :
Move :  ZQSD 
Dig artifact : spam "C"
Destroy artifact ( must be already dug) : "C"
Take artifact and drop into the truck : "X"
Dash : "A"

Progamming : Damien Benloukil

Design : Léandre Renouard
